posts.post_content:
It's so interesting to see all of the Johnnies on here praising Coretapper. However, Coretapper is also a Spike card. It was part T8 lists for many Vintage tournaments - 100+ people tournaments.  
  
2nd place: http://morphling.de/top8decks.php?id=152   
  
7th place: http://www.morphling.de/top8decks.php?id=212  
  
Why? As sick sick tech vs. [Chalice of the Void](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chalice of the Void)  
  
As a Spike, I feel the need to bow down in awe to Johnny's ingenuity.
posts.html:
